summary: The document is a 'SECRET' travel briefing data form for Joseph Piccolo Jr., a GS-9 rank official, detailing his upcoming travel to Mexico City, Mexico. It includes comprehensive sections on security approvals, emergency contacts, security regulations, travel precautions, personal affairs, personal conduct, association with foreigners, hostile audio surveillance, cover problems, and responsibilities abroad. This document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, highlighting its sensitive nature.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
Joseph Piccolo Jr. was a GS-9 rank official with previous travel experience to Belgium-Brussels and Mexico City.
The briefing covers a wide range of security and personal conduct topics for international travel.
The document emphasizes the importance of security measures, including emergency contacts and precautions against hostile surveillance.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
